<title level="1" right="Rules">[Dim Light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2403)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 432 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Areas in shadow or lit by weak light sources are in dim light. Creatures and objects in dim light have the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition, unless the seeker has [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=2410) or [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=2411), or a [precise sense](/Rules.aspx?ID=2406) other than vision.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
